00029 class Object: public Function {
00030     public:
00032         typedef std::vector<unsigned> uintvec1D;
00034         typedef std::vector<uintvec1D> uintvec2D;
00035 
00036         Object (const QString &, unsigned, unsigned);
00037         virtual ~Object () { }
00038         virtual void ReInit (double, double, double,
00039                              double, double, double,
00040                              double, double, double);
00041 
00042         virtual void Transform (double Rxy, double Rxz, double Rxw,
00043                                 double Ryz, double Ryw, double Rzw,
00044                                 double Tx, double Ty, double Tz, double Tw);
00045         virtual void Project (double ScrW, double CamW, bool DepthCue4D);
00046         virtual void Draw (void);
00047         virtual VecMath::Vector<4> &operator () (double, double, double) {
00048             static VecMath::Vector<4> tmp;
00049             return tmp;
00050         }
00051 
00052         virtual unsigned getTsteps() const { return NumVertices; }
00053         virtual unsigned getUsteps() const { return 1; }
00054         virtual unsigned getVsteps() const { return 1; }
00055 
00056         virtual double getTmin() const { return -1; }
00057         virtual double getTmax() const { return 1; }
00058         virtual double getUmin() const { return -1; }
00059         virtual double getUmax() const { return 1; }
00060         virtual double getVmin() const { return -1; }
00061         virtual double getVmax() const { return 1; }
00062 
00063         virtual unsigned getDefinitionSpaceDimensions() { return 0; }
00064 
00065     protected:
00066         virtual void Initialize();
00068         unsigned NumVertices;
00070         unsigned NumSurfaces;
00071 
00072         vec4vec1D X;        
00073         vec4vec1D Xtrans;   
00074         vec3vec1D Xscr;     
00075 
00078         floatvec1D R;
00081         floatvec1D G;
00084         floatvec1D B;
00085 
00087         uintvec2D Surface;
00088 
00093         virtual VecMath::Vector<4> &f (double, double, double) {
00094             static VecMath::Vector<4> tmp;
00095             return tmp;
00096         }
00097 };

00104 class Hypercube: public Object {
00105 public:
00106     Hypercube (): Object ("Hypercube", 16, 24) {
00107         a = 1;
00108         declareParameter("Size", 1.0);
00109         Initialize();
00110     }
00111     Hypercube (double _a,
00112                const VecMath::Vector<4> &_Center = VecMath::Vector<4>(0., 0., 0., 0.));
00113     virtual ~Hypercube() { }
00114 
00115     virtual void SetParameters(const ParameterMap &parms) {
00116 #       if 1
00117             for (ParameterMap::const_iterator i = parms.begin();
00118                  i != parms.end(); ++i) {
00119                 if (i->second->getName() == "Size") a = double(*i->second);
00120             }
00121 #       else
00122             setParameter(parms, this->a, "Size");
00123 #       endif
00124     }
00125 
00126     virtual std::string description () {
00127         std::ostringstream out;
00128         out << "Hypercube (a = " << a << ")" << std::ends;
00129         return out.str ();
00130     }
00131 protected:
00132     virtual void Initialize();
00133     void DeclareSquare (unsigned, unsigned, unsigned, unsigned, unsigned);
00134 
00135     double a;
00136     VecMath::Vector<4> center;
00137 };

00160 class Sponge: public Hypercube {
00161 public:
00163 
00173     Sponge (unsigned _level = 1, unsigned _distance = 2, double _rad = 0.8,
00174             VecMath::Vector<4> _center = VecMath::Vector<4>(0., 0.,0., 0.));
00175     virtual ~Sponge ();
00176 
00177     virtual void Transform (double Rxy, double Rxz, double Rxw,
00178                             double Ryz, double Ryw, double Rzw,
00179                             double Tx, double Ty, double Tz, double Tw);
00180     virtual void Project (double ScrW, double CamW, bool DepthCue4D);
00181     virtual void Draw (void);
00182 
00183     virtual void SetParameters(const ParameterMap &parms) {
00184 #       if 1
00185             for (ParameterMap::const_iterator i = parms.begin();
00186                  i != parms.end(); ++i) {
00187                 if (i->second->getName() == "Level")
00188                     Level = unsigned(*i->second);
00189                 if (i->second->getName() == "Distance")
00190                     distance = unsigned(*i->second);
00191                 if (i->second->getName() == "Size")
00192                     rad = double(*i->second);
00193             }
00194 #       else
00195             setParameter(parms, this->Phase, "Phase");
00196 #       endif
00197         }
00198 
00200     virtual void ReInit (double, double, double,
00201                          double, double, double,
00202                          double, double, double) {
00203         List.clear();
00204         Object::ReInit(0,0,0,0,0,0,0,0,0);
00205     }
00206 
00208     virtual std::string description () {
00209         std::ostringstream out;
00210         out << "Sponge (level = " << Level << ")" << std::ends;
00211         return out.str ();
00212     }
00213 
00214 protected:
00215     virtual void Initialize();
00216     virtual unsigned long MemRequired (unsigned);
00217     unsigned Level;                 
00218 
00220 
00221     std::vector<Hypercube *> List;
00222 
00223     int distance;                   
00224     double rad;                     
00225     VecMath::Vector<4> center;      
00226 };
